title: Садовое кольцо
overview: Vera Smolina can only be envied. She has an ideal family. In her house there is love, harmony and happiness. Until one day her son Ilya disappears. It would seem, what could happen in the cloudless universe of the Faith? Trying to understand what happened to Ilya, despite her lack of faith in her, Vera begins her own investigation. And she discovers that the familiar world that surrounds her is not at all what it seemed.
